dashboard.title: Beneficiary Insights
dashboard.description: An intelligent tool to help you identify duplicates and anomalies in beneficiary data using advanced fuzzy matching and AI.

upload.title: Upload & Cluster
upload.description: Start by uploading your beneficiary data. The system will automatically process the file and run an AI-powered clustering algorithm to find potential duplicates.

review.title: Review Clusters
review.description: Inspect the generated clusters. Use AI summaries and detailed pairwise comparisons to understand why certain records were grouped together.

audit.title: Audit & Export
audit.description: Run a comprehensive data integrity audit to find issues like invalid relationships or duplicate IDs, then export the enriched data to an Excel report.

report.description: Visualize your clustering and audit results in an interactive dashboard with charts and key figures.

export.description: Export the enriched data, cluster details, and audit findings into a comprehensive Excel report.

1.title: 1. Upload File
1.description: Select a file from your device to begin the analysis.

2.title: 2. Map Columns
2.description: Map your sheet columns to the required fields for analysis.

3.title: 3. Run Clustering
3.description: Start the AI-powered analysis to find potential duplicates.

review.title: Cluster Review
review.description: Inspect and analyze potential duplicate clusters from the last processing run. Found {filteredClusters} of {allClusters} clusters.
review.searchPlaceholder: Search by name, husband, or phone...

pairwiseModal.title: Cluster Details
pairwiseModal.description: Review pairwise similarity scores between records in this cluster.

calculatingScores.title: Calculating Scores
calculatingScores.description: Fetching and averaging scores for {clustersToScore} clusters...

calculationComplete.title: Calculations Complete
calculationComplete.description: Average scores and confidence have been updated for all clusters.

noData.title: No Data
noData.description: No clusters found from the last run. Please upload data first.

toasts.loadError: Failed to load clusters from server cache.

noClustersFound.title: No Clusters Found
noClustersFound.description: The last run did not produce any clusters. Try adjusting settings.

loadErrorFromServer.title: Error
loadErrorFromServer.description: Failed to load cluster data from server cache.

audit.title: Data Integrity Audit
audit.description: Run a set of rules against your clustered records to identify potential issues like duplicates and invalid relationships.

summary.title: Audit Summary
summary.description: A summary of the types of issues found across all records.

findings.title: Audit Findings
findings.description: {findings} total issues found across {groupedFindings} unique records.

readyToAudit.title: Ready to Audit
readyToAudit.description: Click "Run Audit" to check the {rows} clustered records for issues.

toasts.noData: Cache ID not found. Please re-upload data.
toasts.noClusteredData: No records were found in clusters to audit.

export.title: Advanced Export Workflow
export.description: Generate and download your comprehensive beneficiary analysis report in a single step.

generateAndDownload.title: Generate and Download Report
generateAndDownload.description: This will generate a single Excel file with multiple sheets: Enriched Data, Review Summary, Cluster Details, and Audit Findings.
generateAndDownload.enableMessage: Please complete the upload and clustering steps first to enable report generation.

status.title: Generation Status
status.idle: Real-time generation status will appear here once you start the process.

toasts.noData: No Data Found. Please start from the upload page to generate data for export.
toasts.fetchError: Failed to fetch cached data. Please try the upload process again.
toasts.noRecords: The cached data is empty. Please re-upload your file.
toasts.reportReadyDescription: {newVersion} has been added to the download panel.

report.title: Report Dashboard
report.description: Visualize your data and navigate to other sections. Use the button below to capture this view for your final Excel export.

mapping.title: Mapping
mapping.description: Map your data columns to the fields required for the report.

charts.title: Tables and Charts
charts.womenAndChildrenDescription: Distribution of mothers and pregnant women.

map.title: Geospatial View
map.description: Map of subdistricts present in your data.

loadError.title: Could not load data. Please start by uploading a file.
loadError.description: No valid data was found in the cache.

noRecords.title: No Records
noRecords.description: The cached data contains no records.

cannotExport.title: Cannot Export
cannotExport.description: Data is not ready. Please complete mapping first.

dashboardCached.title: Dashboard Cached
dashboardCached.description: Visuals have been saved. Proceeding to export page.

exportError.title: Export Error
exportError.description: An error occurred while preparing the export: {message}

settings.title: Clustering â€” Admin Settings (v5)
settings.description: Fine-tune the v5 clustering engine, weights, and rules.

thresholds.title: Thresholds & Performance
thresholds.minPairDescription: The minimum score (0 to 1) for two records to be considered a potential match and form a link. High values create fewer, more confident clusters. Low values create more, but potentially noisier, clusters.
thresholds.minInternalDescription: The minimum score (0 to 1) used to decide if records within a large, temporary cluster should remain together in the final, smaller clusters. High values result in smaller, more tightly-related final clusters.
thresholds.blockChunkSizeDescription: A performance setting for very large datasets. It breaks down large groups of potential matches into smaller chunks to manage memory. The default is usually fine.

weights.title: Final Score Composition
weights.firstNameScoreDescription: Weight for the similarity of the first name.
weights.familyNameScoreDescription: Weight for the similarity of the family name (all parts except the first).
weights.advancedNameScoreDescription: Weight for advanced name matching techniques, like root-letter matching.
weights.tokenReorderScoreDescription: Weight for detecting names with the same words but in a different order.
weights.husbandScoreDescription: Weight for the similarity of the husband's name.
weights.idScoreDescription: Weight for matches on the National ID.
weights.phoneScoreDescription: Weight for matches on the phone number.
weights.locationScoreDescription: Weight for matching village or sub-district names.

rules.title: Rules
rules.enableNameRootEngineDescription: An advanced technique that tries to match names based on their likely root letters, catching more complex variations.
rules.enableTribalLineageDescription: Looks for and gives weight to matches in the tribal or family name parts of a full name.
rules.enableMaternalLineageDescription: Gives weight to similarities found in the maternal parts of a name if they can be identified.
rules.enablePolygamyRulesDescription: Applies special logic for polygamous relationships, such as checking if two women share the same husband and paternal line.

defaultsLoaded.title: Settings not found
defaultsLoaded.description: Loading default settings. Save to create a settings file.

loadError.title: Error loading settings
loadError.description: Could not fetch settings from server. Using defaults.

saveSuccess.title: Settings Saved
saveSuccess.description: Your changes have been saved successfully.

toasts.resetConfirm: Are you sure you want to reset all settings to their defaults?

resetSuccess.title: Settings Reset
resetSuccess.description: Settings have been reset. Click Save to persist.

importSuccess.title: Settings Imported
importSuccess.description: Imported settings previewed. Click Save to persist them.
